entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
